title: 【旧尘原创】Wrestling（角斗）2~4人公平PVP地图

                                                                                【旧尘原创】Wrestling（角斗）2~4人公平PVP地图           
[diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword][diamond_sword]
    大家好，我是旧尘，是一优酷的UP主：http://i.youku.com/dojiuchen[diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_pickaxe]    那么今天给大家带来的是一张PVP地图Wrestling（角斗）
    最近PVP比较火，我也是一名喜欢玩PVP的正版玩家，最近去玩了坏狮子的服务器以后，灵感大发！（详情见籽岷，熄灭的火把视频）

[fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire][fire]
    地图分为：地狱，冰原，草原，丛林，萨瓦娜草原，沙漠，末地
